MIME::Decoder::BinHex(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation MIME::Decoder::BinHex(3)

NAME

MIME::Decoder::BinHex - decode a "binhex" stream

SYNOPSIS

A generic decoder object; see MIME::Decoder for usage.

Also supports a preamble() method to recover text before the binhexed portion of the stream.

DESCRIPTION

A MIME::Decoder subclass for a nonstandard encoding whereby data are binhex-encoded. Common non-standard MIME encodings for this:

    x-uu
    x-uuencode

SEE ALSO

MIME::Decoder
